TopicTitle: New the forums not the game

Articles.Content:
I\'m new to the forums, not the game. Been playing since 0.14. After 5 minutes of the demo, I paid for the game. That says a lot because I\'m not a big time gamer but this game blew me away. BRING ON THE CHEEZY: I\'ve always loved the space program and loosing our (US) manned mission program broke my heart.

As most kids, I wanted to be an astronaut. Must have seen 'Space Camp' and 'Explorers' a hundred times. This game not only gives me an outlet for that, it lets me explore space on my own terms.

I cannot give enough praise to the SQUAD team and the mods. I can honestly say, this is the best game (simulator) I have ever played. I feel honored to be a part of it and watch how it develops.

Thanks,

Chad

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
